titleStmt.title: Balliofergus, or, A commentary upon the foundation, founders and affaires of Balliol Colledge gathered out of the records ... : with a brief description of eminent persons who have been formerly of the same house : whereunto is added, an exact catalogue of all the heads of the same college ... : together with two tables, one of endowments, the other of miscellanies / by Henry Savage ...
titleStmt.author: H. S. (Henry Savage), 1604?-1672.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
